A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: I loved the film. I thought it was epic. I loved the last scene with Luke. The cinematography was excellent. I hate that some very rabid fans are unfairly trashing the film and causing it to now start doing worse at the box office. I have seen it twice and can't wait to see it again. Great acting\, great story\, great production. Just because it didn't fulfill the theories of so-called fans is no reason for the movie to be trashed.
